original: Klinge, Tryggve, disponent, Alingsås, f. 6/1/88 i Karlstad av disp. Martin Fredrik K. o. Serine Pedersen. G. 13 m. Edith Svensson. Barn: Solveig f. 14, Martin-Fredrik 17, Stina 22, Ulla-Britt 24, Ulf 25, Oilav 33. — Yrkesstud. i USA 08, i Frankr. o. Tyskl. 10, ex. v. garvarsk. i Freiberg 10. Chef v. Läderfabr. A-B Göta i Alingsås 20-42, inneh. av Tryggve Klinge Handels- & Fabr:firmia sed. 4’2. Init:tag. t. Alingsås faibr:- o. han tv: för en. 10, dess ordf. 20-45, styr :led. o. hed :ordf. där, ordf. i Älvsb. läns hantv :diistr. sammani. femton år, desis hed :led,., led. av stadsfulkn. 3(1-301 Medil. av Frimurarorden o. Göt. Förib. Hobbies: miusdk o. litt. PatrGM, Sv:e’s liantv :org. förtjSM o. -GM, Aliingsås’ fabr:- o. hantv :fören. GM.
translated: Klinge, Tryggve, manager, Alingsås, b. 6/1/88 in Karlstad to manager Martin Fredrik K. and Serine Pedersen. Married 13 with Edith Svensson. Children: Solveig b. 14, Martin-Fredrik b. 17, Stina b. 22, Ulla-Britt b. 24, Ulf b. 25, Oilav b. 33. Professional studies in the USA 08, in France and Germany 10, graduated from a tannery school in Freiberg 10. Head of the Leather Factory A-B Göta in Alingsås from 20-42, owner of Tryggve Klinge Trade & Manufacture Firm since 42. Initiator of the Alingsås trade and industry association for ten years, chairman from 20-45, board member and honorary chairman there, chairman of the Älvsborg county craft district assembly for fifteen years, honorary member of the assembly. Also a member of the Freemason Order and Göteborg Society. Hobbies: music and literature. Recognitions: earned SM and GM ranks in the Swedish craft organization, honorary member of Alingsås' trade and industry association.

structured.name: Tryggve Klinge
